bibliography.title: Kinetic investigation of the time-resolved atomic fluorescence Sr(5^3P_1 → 5^1S_o) and molecular chemiluminescence SrCl(A^2π, B^2Σ^+ → X^3Σ^+) following the pulsed dye-laser generation of Sr(5^3P_J) in the presence of CH_3Cl and CF_3Cl
